locations.name: Isabella's Bedroom
locations.description: A 9-year-old girl's bedroom in Cartagena, Colombia. Pink and purple walls, small bed with pink butterfly comforter, stuffed animals (teddy bear, unicorn), cartoon character posters, small desk with school supplies, bookshelf with children's books, small vanity with mirror and hair accessories, tile floor with colorful rug. Cheerful, child-appropriate space.
key_features: small bed with pink butterfly comforter
basket of hair ribbons and accessories

lighting_conditions.evening: warm lamp light, night light glow

variations: wide shot showing bed and desk
